text:
Zee Bangla is a leading Bengali language cable television channel in India. It is offered by Zee Network, part of the Essel Group.
The first Bengali-language television channel in India, Zee Bangla was launched in 1996 by Zee's TV chairman.
It aired the comedy show "Raja and Gaja" before the show switched stations.
It airs very popular shows. Some of the notable shows are "Rannaghor","Didi No. 1","Dadagiri Unlimited","Dance Bangla Dance", SaReGaMaPa, Karunamoyee Rani Rashmoni, Seema Rekha,Vanumotir Khel, and Bokul Kotha.
Top Bengali Channels.
This is a list of top five Bangla channels in India as per Broadcast Audience Research Council (BARC) ratings.
YouTube.
It has its own YouTube Channel and becomes the 1st Bengali-content channel to cross 1 million subscribers.
